code: import React from'react';var BookDetail=function BookDetail(_ref){var book=_ref.book;if(!book){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"Select a book...");}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"bookdetail col-4"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,book.volumeInfo.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,book.volumeInfo.description),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,book.volumeInfo.authors),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,book.volumeInfo.publishedDate),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{className:"card-img-top ",alt:book.title,src:book.volumeInfo.imageLinks===undefined?"":"".concat(book.volumeInfo.imageLinks.thumbnail)}));};export default BookDetail;
